DataElement.preferredName: Diagnosis Performed Observation Outcome Present At Admission Code PCORnet CDM Diagnosis Present on Admission Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._Executed and carried through to completion._Watching something and taking note of what happens._The result of an action._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time._Used to indicate position, location, or state._The condition of being allowed to enter; the activity of admitting someone to something._A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection._Flag to denote whether diagnosis was present on inpatient admission.
